duties_responsibilities.duty: Be part of a project team working closely with clients to define their strategy and execute on their most critical priorities.
Support the C-suite and their teams with their most strategic IT initiatives and enable lasting results.
Provide actionable recommendations to achieve objectives and work with clients to develop creative solutions and strategies to solve client problems.
Give exposure to Gartner’s industry and practice experts, comprehensive technology research, data, and tools, as well as their award-winning culture.
Experience what it’s like to work at Gartner and start building the skills and relationships that would enable success going forward.

education_certification.credential: Current enrollment in an MBA or other relevant advanced degree program with a December 2023 – June 2024 graduation date
